title: CatBar
description: Cat-themed craft beer and burger bar with 9 taps and 30+ bottles of mainly local Catalan & Spanish beers. Serves a selection of vegan burgers and a daily wheat-free plate; also raw vegan cakes. Please order at the bar. A piano is available for anyone who can play. Kitchen is open Mon-Sat 7pm-11pm; the bar stays open until 1-2:30am Thur-Sat. Free Wi-Fi. No reservation taken. No air-con. At busy time a waiting list might operate. Directions: on Via Laietana going inland take next street on right after c/Princesa (at c/Boria 17, street renames itself to c/Carders after 100 meters).
